metaDescription: Discover ARENA GOLF in Altea, La Finca Golf. Luxury 4-bed villas from €790,000. MAMOSOL development. Delivery 2026. Golf, beach, cultural lifestyle.

content.heroIntro: Welcome to ARENA GOLF, an exclusive development by MAMOSOL in the prestigious La Finca Golf community of Altea, Alicante. This sophisticated villa project represents the perfect blend of modern architecture, Mediterranean lifestyle, and investment potential on the Costa Blanca. Each residence features 4 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms across 180m² of meticulously designed living space, set on generous 295m² plots that offer privacy and outdoor living. Starting from €790,000, ARENA GOLF caters to discerning international buyers seeking quality, location, and value. The development is strategically positioned within one of Spain's most sought-after golf communities, attracting a diverse, culturally-rich expat community including Germans, Scandinavians, and Dutch residents. With delivery scheduled for September 1, 2026, this is an opportunity to secure a premium property before completion. MAMOSOL's reputation for quality construction and attention to detail ensures your investment is built to the highest standards.

locationSection.intro: La Finca Golf in Altea represents one of the Costa Blanca's most desirable residential destinations. This gated golf community seamlessly combines sporting excellence with authentic Mediterranean living, nestled between the dramatic mountains and the sparkling Mediterranean Sea. Altea itself is renowned as an artistic and cultural hub, famous for its whitewashed Old Town, vibrant creative community, and sophisticated lifestyle. The area attracts a cosmopolitan demographic, particularly from Northern Europe, creating a unique blend of Spanish tradition and international culture. The location offers exceptional proximity to world-class amenities: Hospital Marina Baixa is just 10 minutes away, ensuring peace of mind for healthcare needs. Beautiful beaches like Playa de la Roda and Cap Negret are within easy reach for those seeking sun and sea. The community benefits from excellent infrastructure, including TRAM connections to Benidorm and Alicante, and reliable bus services. Shopping, dining, and recreational facilities are abundant, while the peaceful golf-focused setting provides a retreat from urban hustle.

propertyFeatures.intro: ARENA GOLF villas represent contemporary Spanish construction excellence. Built to exacting standards by MAMOSOL, each residence incorporates premium materials, efficient energy systems, and thoughtful design that maximizes both comfort and sustainability. The villas feature modern, open-plan living spaces that blur the boundary between interior and outdoor living, ideal for the Mediterranean lifestyle. High-quality finishes throughout, including porcelain flooring, fitted kitchens with Bosch appliances, and contemporary bathroom suites, ensure these homes are move-in ready. Climate control systems, double-glazed windows with thermal breaks, and sophisticated security features provide year-round comfort and peace of mind.

content.investmentSection: ARENA GOLF represents a compelling investment opportunity within a market demonstrating strong fundamentals. The Costa Blanca property market has shown consistent year-on-year growth of 6%, with Altea specifically benefiting from its status as a cultural and artistic destination. Property values in the area are approximately 25% lower than comparable developments in Mallorca, offering exceptional value for international buyers. The rental market remains robust, with similar properties commanding €1,100 for 7-night holiday lets, providing strong income potential for investors seeking rental returns. The development's golf-course setting and proximity to premium amenities ensure sustained demand from both owner-occupiers and investment purchasers. With MAMOSOL's track record of delivering quality developments that maintain and appreciate in value, ARENA GOLF offers both lifestyle benefits and solid financial performance.

faqs.question: What is the price of properties in ARENA GOLF?
faqs.answer: Properties at ARENA GOLF start from €790,000. The development offers 4-bedroom, 3-bathroom villas with 180m² of built space on 295m² plots. Only 2 units remain available. Contact our team via WhatsApp for current pricing and availability details.

faqs.question: When will ARENA GOLF be completed?
faqs.answer: ARENA GOLF is scheduled for completion on September 1, 2026. MAMOSOL provides a comprehensive 10-year structural warranty on all properties. Specific unit delivery schedules can be discussed with our sales team.

faqs.question: Who is the developer of ARENA GOLF?
faqs.answer: MAMOSOL is the developer. They have an established track record building quality residential developments throughout Altea and the Costa Blanca, known for meticulous attention to detail and customer satisfaction.

faqs.question: Is Altea a good place to buy property?
faqs.answer: Yes, Altea is an excellent location for property investment. It's a thriving artistic and cultural destination popular with German, Scandinavian, and Dutch buyers. The market shows +6% year-on-year growth, with outstanding amenities including Hospital Marina Baixa (10 minutes), beautiful beaches, world-class golf courses, and a vibrant expat community.

faqs.question: How far is ARENA GOLF from the beach?
faqs.answer: ARENA GOLF is approximately 5 minutes' drive from Playa de la Roda, one of Altea's most beautiful beaches known for clear waters and pebbly shores. Cap Negret and L'Olla beaches are also within easy reach, perfect for daily beach access during summer months.

faqs.question: What amenities are near ARENA GOLF?
faqs.answer: ARENA GOLF is surrounded by excellent amenities: Healthcare - Hospital Marina Baixa (10 minutes), private medical/dental clinics; Shopping - Mercadona and Consum supermarkets (8 minutes), weekly market on Tuesdays; Golf - Don Cayo (10 minutes), Villaitana (15 minutes), La Sella (25 minutes); Transport - TRAM to Benidorm/Alicante (15 minutes), good bus connections; Education - Colegio Español María Inmaculada (8 minutes).

faqs.question: Can foreigners buy property in ARENA GOLF?
faqs.answer: Yes, foreigners can purchase property in Spain without requiring a visa specifically for property purchase. You will need a Spanish tax identification number (NIE). Non-residents should budget for approximately 7-8% in purchasing costs (legal, registration, and notary fees). Our team can connect you with English-speaking legal advisors to guide the process.

faqs.question: What are the rental prospects for ARENA GOLF?
faqs.answer: ARENA GOLF properties have strong rental potential. Similar premium villas in the area achieve €1,100 for 7-night holiday lets during peak season. The combination of golf amenities, beach proximity, and Altea's popularity with international tourists makes this an attractive holiday rental destination.
